author: Sandeep Rai
title: What awaits migrants when they reach home
description: India News: For returning migrants, it's been a homecoming sans joy, little hope
content:
Self-quarantining on a boat
Niranjan Haldar, who earns his living singing 'kirtans', had come to visit his niece at Dubapara village in West Bengal’s Malda district five days back. However, he faced hostile villagers at Dubapara, who demanded he get himself … [+561 chars]
